arts.ttl: Swift, Wallace, Corberan and the phone call Tony Mowbray made to accelerate West Brom talks
arts.sum: At his second unveiling on Monday, Mowbray discussed a number of different subjects, including his backroom staff, the club's fringe players and on his predecessor, the departed Carlos Corberan... "What I found at this club, there's not too many of them [moaners or sulkers] and yet from the outside looking in I might be thinking, because I'm on record, I've said I always thought Jed Wallace was one of the best players in the league.

arts.ttl: Tony Mowbray celebrates five-star homecoming as West Brom ease past Portsmouth
arts.sum: “We said we need to score 60 or 70 goals because that’s what promoted teams do. John Swift scored the fifth in the 56th minute in Albion’s most emphatic win since hammering Swansea by the same scoreline in December 2019.

arts.ttl: 'It's vital' - Portsmouth legend backs John Mousinho after he priortised 'more important' Millwall fixture over West Brom
arts.sum: Guy Whittingham believes John Mousinho had every right to rotate his team for Saturday’s Championship trip to West Brom.

arts.ttl: ‘Probably won’t be…’: Jed Wallace’s message to Portsmouth faithful after favourite sinks old side at West Brom
arts.sum: Jed Wallace is adamant Pompey’s Championship fate will not be decided by games like the 5-1 West Brom thrashing.

arts.ttl: 'We didn't have a choice': Portsmouth boss defends unpopular team selection after West Brom humiliation
arts.sum: John Mousinho has defended the decision to protect his players from Pompey’s ‘absolutely brutal’ January schedule.

arts.ttl: 'Absolute shocker, Completely disappeared, Take a bow lad': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against West Brom
arts.sum: Wretched Pompey were blown apart by West Brom in 5-1 defeat to once again expose their away problem.

arts.ttl: 'Refund every travelling fan. Depth is so weak. Done now, forget it' - Portsmouth fans react to 5-1 thumping at West Brom
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been sharing their views after John Mousinho’s side lost 5-1 at West Brom on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Grady Diangana bags brace as Tony Mowbray enjoys five-star West Brom homecoming
arts.sum: Portsmouth’s Schmid gifted goals for Alex Mowatt and Diangana.

arts.ttl: Pitiful Portsmouth crash to another numbing away thrashing at West Brom
arts.sum: Pompey collapsed to another embarrassing away thrashing as calamitous defending led to a West Brom battering.

arts.ttl: ‘So poor’. 'Class one that’ – Portsmouth faithful debate starting XI at West Brom as boss 'targets’ Millwall game
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been heavily debating John Mousinho’s team selection for today’s Championship fixture at West Brom.
